flawed_nl_solution:
He is 6 inches too short this year because 54 - 48 = <<54-48=6>>6
He will naturally grow 36/1 inches taller because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=36/1>>36/1
He needs to grow -30 inches from hanging because 6 - 36/1 = <<6-36/1=-30>>-30
He needs to hang for -360 hours because -30 / (1/12) = <<-30/(1/12)=-360>>-360
He needs to hang for -30 hours a month because -360 / 12 = <<-360/12=-30>>-30
#### -30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 36/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
